reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Hotel was lovely and ticked all the boxes for a relaxing birthday getaway. Staff were helpful and very curteous. Beds were very comfortable and the room service was excellent. I was given a bottle of champagne and a birthday cake on my birthday which was a lovely gesture by the manager, and very much appreciated!
reviews.title: Nothing to complain about!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: What a brilliant hotel, Beautiful location, very clean. Staff are very nice.
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best hotel i've ever stayed in. Nice for a relaxing trip to porugal, faro is 30 mins by car or train which only cost afew euros. Breakfast is very nice.
reviews.title: best hotel in portugal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Go here!!!
reviews.title: A taste of real Portugal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: great hotel , pool , spa , service . very clean with top class staff. so good i am going back
reviews.title: Beyond expectations! Lovely Hotel, perfect short break.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned today after a 4 night stay at this wonderful hotel - obtained a fantastic deal though Travelzoo.com, thank you Hotel Real Marina & Spa for making this possible, i will certainly be recommending it to my family and friends.
reviews.title: Hotel Fantastic, facilities and staff excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate each night in the restaurant and it was superb as was the staff - we really enjoyed the whole dining room experience.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel in an amazing location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Spa facilites also excellant, the treatments we had were very enjoyable.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel, lovely location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Tea making facilities in room would be a plus.
reviews.title: Ideal for a few days.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Just came back from a 4 day stay at the Real Marina hotel and I cannot recommend highly enough both the hotel and the area (Olhao and the surrounding areas).
reviews.title: beware check your bill !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Without contradiction, Real Marina Hotel, Olhao ticked all the correct boxes that makes it the perfect place to stay. Each client is made to feel, by every member of staff, that he or she is of the utmost importance to them. From the moment you arrive at reception until the time you leave you will be made most welcome. Every member of staff we encountered went out of their way to help you with any queries you might have. As for the hotel itself it is new with good facilities. The bedrooms are large and squeaky clean with fine balconies.The food was of good variety. My wife and myself had a lovely 7 nights holiday at the Real Marina Hotel and were sad to leave. Enjoy.
reviews.title: A truly five star hotel and service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed staying at this hotel, beautiful rooms, pool, breakfast etc. Also thought location was good. Caught ferry to one of the 3 islands one day. Train to Tivira, bus to Faro, convenient location. Really enjoyed our stay. The staff at the hotel were friendly and helpful. The pool and snack bar area was lovely to sit with a good reasonably priced menu.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011
reviews.text: We spent Pesah 2011 at this wonderful hotel. It is beautiful and newbuilding with very attentive Portugese staff. In our case we joined a kosher caterer who 'took over' a large part of the rooms. The Israeli/French caterter promised the usually array of pesah services and high kosher cuisine. The proof was literally in the eating >>> and for the first part of the holiday was not very good. So many people complained to the caterer that the Hotel management took drastic action and interveened in the menu (wonderful fresh salads, local fish) and organisation. The second part of the stay was much better. The lesson that we have taken from our 5000 EUR experience was that we were very badly let down by the the kosher caterer and saved by the hotel ... you have been warned!
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel for Pesah/Passover, but be careful of your choice of kosher caterer

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is indeed a lovely hotel. The location is at one end of the town of Olhao which is not great. Unlike other 5star hotels in the Algarve it is not really a good beach location. It is more of a city/touring the Algarve hotel.The staff are oustanding. We had a sea view room which is important.
reviews.title: Fine hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our week at Real Marina was realy very good.Very confortable and clean room.
reviews.title: Fantastic location,great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I have just returned from a wonderful week at The Real Marina and Spa Hotel (Mon 28th Feb-Mon 7th March).
reviews.title: A truly fantastic hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything about the hotel has the 'wow' factor from the check-in desk, rooms, dining, pools etc. A hotel is only as good as its staff and the staff at this hotel are superb in every way. The reception was trouble free checking in and out and they would go out of their way to help you. The dining staff were very efficient and very friendly and always had a smile for you. They all worked very efficiently. All the cleaners all had a smile and would say hello.
reviews.title: hidden gem in the algarve

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had found a half-board winter break via Booking.com. We had booked a "Village Room" overlooking the town but were very pleasanltly surprised to see we had been given a room at the front/side at the side of the hotel with a lovely view of the Ria Formosa . A great balcony, a lovely marble bathroom, 2 VERY comfortable beds and superb furnishings. We were on the third floor easily accessed via 3 panoramic lifts.
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms, helpful staff, would recommend.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is really a bed and breakfast hotel but with a superb public restaurant. The breakfasts are very sumptious with an excellent choice of everything you can think of. There was even champagne for breakfast if you wanted it! As we were booked half board we were given food vouchers to be used in the restuarant or bar. These were given by reception when you book in. These were excellent value as it allowed 2 people to eat to the value of 28 Euros each per day. This easily covered a starter, main course and desert on the public menu. Yes it does take a long time between entering the restaurant and finishing your meal, approx 1 and a half hours, but this is explained by the fact that the food is so beautifully cooked, perfection does take time. You were made to feel so special we looked forward to dining there every night. Sunday night was a gala night with special food and drinks included. There were 2 Portugese guitarists and a singer serenading us during the evening. A nice ending to our holiday! We were also pleased that although a public restaurant, dress code was casual, there were holidaymakers, women footballers for the Algarve Cup and travel agent delegates. One beer and a coke came to 5.80 Euros during our meal. Yes, the drinks are a little more expensive than local bars, but you got far better surroundings and at cost of just 530 Euros for 2 for the week half board you couldn't grumble at bar prices.
reviews.title: COMFORTABLE AND CONVENIENT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The outside pool we never used as it was just a little bit too chilly outside! However the indooor pool and jacuzzi are superb and warm. My wife tried the steam room and sauna in the spa and said it was wonderful. It is 10 Euros extra for the public or 8.50 Euros for hotel guests. The two pools are free to all hotel guests.
reviews.title: Nice hotel
